article: Two sons worked for their father on the family farm. For some years, the _ brother had been given more _ to do than the older one. The older brother couldn t _ why, so one day he asked his father the _ why he always trusted his younger brother to do more work. The father said, "Go to the Kelly s _ nearby and see if they have any _ to sell." The older brother soon _ with the answer, "Yes, they have five ducks they can _ to us." That father then said, "Good, now please ask them the _ for the ducks." The son returned, "The ducks are $10 each." The father asked, "25 can they deliver the ducks?"
